# test install and use Hello Word Applet operation
# card is Cyberflex Palmera V3
# security level is NO_SECURITY
#

# Select GP and Authentification step
00 A4 04 00 08 A0 00 00 00 03 00 00 00
6F 19 84 08 A0 00 00 00 03 00 00 00 A5 0D 9F 6E 06 19 81 30 52 02 00 9F 65 01 FF 90 00
80 50 01 00 08 5B CD C5 D1 73 02 97 EC
00 00 51 73 21 79 B8 FE 48 51 01 01 EA F0 6F EE E2 A0 2C 8D CB 29 20 D4 92 5D 1E 1A 90 00
84 82 00 00 10 4A AA 01 24 BF E6 B0 9A E8 F1 A8 4F D2 27 F8 45
90 00

# Select Hello World Applet ...
00 A4 04 00 0A A0 00 00 00 62 03 01 0C 01 01
